text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙojad ƣulomoni sumo va on farzandone, ki hanuz ʙa ʙaloƣat narasidaand, dar se vaqt az sumo ʙaroi vorid sudan ʙa xona ruxsat talaʙand: pes az namozi suʙh va hangomi zuhr, ki liʙos az tan ʙerun mekuned va ʙa'd az namozi xuftan. In se vaqt, vaqti xilvati sumost. Dar ƣajri in se vaqt nest vuʙole na ʙar sumo va na ʙar onhoe, ki nazdi sumo doxil mesavand napursida, cunki ʙa'zei sumo ʙar ʙa'ze digar omadu raftkunandagoned. Alloh ojotro incunin ʙaroi sumo ʙajon mekunad. Va Alloh donovu hakim ast
